description: Draw an ally with 5+ Power, or grow an ally to 5 Power this round.
descriptionRaw: Draw an ally with 5+ Power, or grow an ally to 5 Power this round.
flavorText: "Few are given the opportunity to serve in the Trifarian Legion. Do not squander this chance." - Trifarian Assessor
name: Legionary Charge

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grow my Power to that of the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>equipped</style></link> ally this round.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Grow my Power to that of the strongest equipped ally this round.
flavorText:
“Been having dreams again, hearing that voice in the dark. Ten years... a whole bloody decade spent as the empire's obedient dog. Go there. Kill that. And for what? The glory of Noxus? Glory’s a pretty lie, and I fell for it. But no more. Kayn’s shown me a different path, and it leads to vengeance.”
- Royce, The Butcher’s journal
name: Noxian Defector

description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: The <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy and I <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
descriptionRaw: Round End: The Strongest enemy and I strike each other.
flavorText: Ancient muscles flexed once more. The warrior heard her general's call, and knew where she was needed--south, in the lands she once known as Icathia.
name: Naganeka of Zuretta

flavorText: The steppes of eastern Valoran were known to be barren, unfit to feed or home the Noxii people. But as the centuries fell by, a new empire was founded, hungry for expansion. Fallow lands found new fertility under new farming techniques, and weapons once thought safely buried become uncovered once again.
name: The Darkin Ballista

description: Draw an ally with 5+ Power.
descriptionRaw: Draw an ally with 5+ Power.
flavorText: "Few are given the opportunity to serve in the Trifarian Legion. Do not squander this chance." - Trifarian Assessor
name: Legionary Charge

description: Grow an ally to 5 Power this round.
descriptionRaw: Grow an ally to 5 Power this round.
flavorText: "Few are given the opportunity to serve in the Trifarian Legion. Do not squander this chance." - Trifarian Assessor
name: Legionary Charge

description: When I'm summoned, I <link=vocab.Improvise><style=Vocab>Improvise</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, I Improvise.
flavorText: Trisk’s life was turned upside down when, during what would be her last fishing tournament, she somehow managed to fish up a sputtering Jax. He refuses to discuss the incident, but the sea monster Trisk rescued him from gets bigger each time she retells it.
name: Ionian Hookmaster

description: You may spend 8 mana to play me as <link=card.unit><style=AssociatedCard>Naganeka of Zuretta</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: You may spend 8 mana to play me as Naganeka of Zuretta.
flavorText: The steppes of eastern Valoran were known to be barren, unfit to feed or home the Noxii people. But as the centuries fell by, a new empire was founded, hungry for expansion. Fallow lands found new fertility under new farming techniques, and weapons once thought safely buried become uncovered once again.
name: The Darkin Ballista

description: <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Deal 1 to my supported ally to grant me +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Support: Deal 1 to my supported ally to grant me +1|+1.
flavorText: "It's rather fun, feeding the birds. I wagered with poor Feoward that they'd sup blood as keenly as a Bordent basilisk, and lo and behold: the pigeons are Noxian indeed!" - Edvin Cortain, Crimson Curator
name: Crimson Pigeon

description: Deal 2 to an ally to give allies +2|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to an ally to give allies +2|+0 this round.
flavorText: "It's not a feast until someone starts screaming. So scream, boy." - Vladimir
name: Reveler's Feast

flavorText: Vessid isn't the Bordent's fastest Reckoner, but when his great hammers find their target, there's never much of an opponent left to fight back.
name: Great Hammers

description: An <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: An Equipped ally strikes an enemy.
flavorText: "Brothers in blood, once again!" - Noxian Defector
name: Furious Wielder

description: When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Reforge><style=Vocab>Reforge</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, Reforge.
flavorText: For months, he'd slogged through the cold and the rain, a thankless task with no end in sight. And yet the end came. Finally, he would make something of himself.
name: Rune Squire

description: Destroy an enemy's equipment. An ally and that enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
descriptionRaw: Destroy an enemy's equipment. An ally and that enemy strike each other.
flavorText:
"One two, watch him scream,
The soldier's caught on fi-re,
three four, watch him burn,
Tibbers wants a py-re!" - Annie
name: Brutal Skirmish

description:
<link=vocab.Origin><style=Vocab>Origin</style></link>: <link=card.origin><style=AssociatedCard>Grandmaster at Arms</style></link>.
<link=vocab.AutoEquip><style=Vocab>Auto-Equip</style></link>: <link=card.equipment><style=AssociatedCard>The Light of Icathia</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Origin: Grandmaster at Arms.
Auto-Equip: The Light of Icathia.
levelupDescription: Equipped allies have struck for 12+ damage. <style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: Equipped allies have struck for 12+ damage.
flavorText: Centuries ago, Jax lost his homeland to the Void. Now, he travels the world, searching for warriors with the strength of will--and the sheer gall--to one day stand against that terrible foe.
name: Jax

description: If <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Jax</style></link> has leveled, <link=card.selfref><style=AssociatedCard>The Light of Icathia</style></link> has <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: If Jax has leveled, The Light of Icathia has Overwhelm.
flavorText: "It's a stick with a heavy bit at the end. Weapon enough for me." - Jax
name: The Light of Icathia

description:
<link=vocab.AutoEquip><style=Vocab>Auto-Equip</style></link> <link=card.equipment><style=AssociatedCard>The Light of Icathia</style></link>.
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give me +1|+1 for each <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>equipped</style></link> ally this round.
descriptionRaw:
Auto-Equip The Light of Icathia.
Attack: Give me +1|+1 for each equipped ally this round.
flavorText: "Icathia's been quiet a long time. But while I'm still standin', her people's roar will echo forever!" - Jax
name: Jax

description: You may put any Weaponmaster cards into your deck during deckbuilding.
descriptionRaw: You may put any Weaponmaster cards into your deck during deckbuilding.
name: Grandmaster at Arms

description:
Give <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Jax</style></link> <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round and <link=vocab.Forge><style=Vocab>Forge</style></link> him.
Shuffle a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Jax</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Give Jax Barrier this round and Forge him.
Shuffle a Jax into your deck.
flavorText: "That's right, eyes on the champ!" - Jax
name: Jax's Counter Strike

description:
<link=vocab.Origin><style=Vocab>Origin</style></link>: <link=card.origin><style=AssociatedCard>The Rune Mage</style></link>.
When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Delve Into The Pasts</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Origin: The Rune Mage.
When I'm summoned or Round Start: Create 2 Delve Into The Pasts in your deck.
flavorText: Ryze crested the ridge, accompanied by Kayle's silent servant. He looked down on a land scarred by war, and caught sight of the darkin monstrosities warring below. For centuries, he had watched on as humanity veered from one catastrophe to another. What if, he thought, his efforts were futile, and Runeterra was doomed to die?"
name: Ryze

description:
When I'm <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Played</style></link>, if I'm unique, activate all your other World Runes.
When I'm <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Played</style></link> or activated, deal 2 to the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm Played, if I'm unique, activate all your other World Runes.
When I'm Played or activated, deal 2 to the weakest enemy.
flavorText: Of all the wrongs Ryze had witnessed in his time on Runeterra, this cut the deepest. How could his own master, who inculcated in Ryze the virtues of control and patience, lose himself so fully to the World Runes? How?!
name: Shard of Betrayal

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an attacking enemy.
descriptionRaw: Stun an attacking enemy.
flavorText: "Enough!" - Ryze
name: Rune Prison

description:
Draw 3. Discard any followers drawn.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Ryze</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Draw 3. Discard any followers drawn.
Create a Ryze in your deck.
flavorText: "The shards will show me the path..." - Ryze
name: Ryze's Realm Warp

description:
When I'm <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Played</style></link>, if I'm unique, activate all your other World Runes.
When I'm <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Played</style></link> or activated, refill 2 spell mana.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm Played, if I'm unique, activate all your other World Runes.
When I'm Played or activated, refill 2 spell mana.
flavorText: Lust for power seemed a common trait among the Runeterrans. Even Targon's revered few craved it, and so when they realized that simple flattery could bring them the power of the stars themselves, they didn't hesitate.
name: Shard of Reverence

description:
When I'm <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Played</style></link>, if I'm unique, activate all your other World Runes.
When I'm <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Played</style></link> or activated, heal allied <link=card.ryze><style=AssociatedCard>Ryzes</style></link> and your Nexus 2.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm Played, if I'm unique, activate all your other World Runes.
When I'm Played or activated, heal allied Ryzes and your Nexus 2.
flavorText: Love. A fog that blinds the wise to reason, and that rids the patient of patience. Ryze watched on as the King lowered his beloved beneath the waters, and closed his eyes as the screaming began. Ryze felt the cold grip of undeath spread through the room, then beyond. All for love.
name: Shard of Hope

description: Deal 2 to the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to the weakest enemy.
flavorText: "THEY ARE MINE TO CONTROL! MINE!" - Tyrus
name: Overload

description:
When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Delve Into The Pasts</style></link> in your deck.
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Activate all your World Runes. If you have 5 unique World Runes, destroy the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned or Round Start: Create 2 Delve Into The Pasts in your deck.
Attack: Activate all your World Runes. If you have 5 unique World Runes, destroy the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: Ryze pulled himself back to the present. The mindscapes he'd visited had answered his questions, and filled him with purpose. The flaws of Runeterra's people, great as they were, should not condemn them to oblivion.
name: Ryze

description:
When I'm <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Played</style></link>, if I'm unique, activate all your other World Runes.
When I'm <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Played</style></link> or activated, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Rune Prison</style></link> in hand or if you have one, reduce its cost by 1.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm Played, if I'm unique, activate all your other World Runes.
When I'm Played or activated, create a Rune Prison in hand or if you have one, reduce its cost by 1.
flavorText: The god-warriors of Shurima were thought peerless. Perfect. But years of war against an unstoppable foe eventually bowed their spirits, then broke them entirely. Xolaani and Aatrox turned on each other in a dispute that soon threatened Runeterra's very existence.
name: Shard of Madness

description: Choose one of two World Runes you don't have in play or in hand and create it in hand. If you can't, draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Choose one of two World Runes you don't have in play or in hand and create it in hand. If you can't, draw 1.
flavorText: Before him, the world teetered on the brink of apocalypse. Ryze had the power to save Runeterra, but as he watched the carnage unfolding ahead of him, a single question lingered in him: should he? He resolved to create mindscapes of Runeterra's pivotal moments, and let his understanding of the land's history decide its future.
name: Delve Into The Past

description:
When I'm <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Played</style></link>, if I'm unique, activate all your other World Runes.
When I'm <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Played</style></link> or activated, draw 1.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm Played, if I'm unique, activate all your other World Runes.
When I'm Played or activated, draw 1.
flavorText: Ryze watched on as the mindscape before him constructed itself. Before him. the Icathians warred with Shurima in a desperate bid for freedom. Ryze knew too well what came next, but watched on regardless. Cruel purple tendrils burst out, engulfing the battlefield. Icathia reached for freedom, but in the darkness, unleashed the Void upon Runeterra.
name: Shard of Violence

description:
You may put any non-targeted <link=keyword.Burst><sprite name=Burst><style=Keyword>Burst</style></link> and <link=keyword.Focus><sprite name=Focus><style=Keyword>Focus</style></link> spells into your deck during deckbuilding.
At the start of the game, create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Delve Into The Past</style></link> in your deck for each Ryze that started the game in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
You may put any non-targeted Burst and Focus spells into your deck during deckbuilding.
At the start of the game, create 2 Delve Into The Past in your deck for each Ryze that started the game in your deck.
flavorText: Can this world be saved? And if it can... should it?
name: The Rune Mage

description:
<link=vocab.Origin><style=Vocab>Origin</style></link>: <link=card.origin><style=AssociatedCard>The Shadow Reaper</style></link>.
<link=vocab.AutoEquip><style=Vocab>Auto-Equip</style></link>: <link=card.equipment><style=AssociatedCard>The Darkin Scythe</style></link>.
When I kill an enemy, heal me 2.
descriptionRaw:
Origin: The Shadow Reaper.
Auto-Equip: The Darkin Scythe.
When I kill an enemy, heal me 2.
levelupDescription: I've <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>struck</style></link> twice.<style=Variable></style> When I level up, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> me.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've struck twice. When I level up, Recall me.
flavorText: As another body fell, Kayn let out a gleeful laugh, knowing that he would soon unleash the second Darkin weapon that lay below. Within him, Rhaast's anticipation grew, knowing that Kayn’s undoing was finally near.
name: Kayn

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Corrupted Scythe</style></link> +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Grant Corrupted Scythe +1|+1.
flavorText: As Kayn yielded his spirit to the Darkin, his anger subsided and an unbearable emptiness was left in its place. The young warrior was gone. Only Rhaast remained.
name: Corrupted Scythe

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Shadow Scythe</style></link> +2|+0.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Grant Shadow Scythe +2|+0.
flavorText: Kayn’s anger grew into a fearsome blaze amidst Rhaast's furious screams. The Darkin's hold on the shadow warrior burned away, and when Kayn rose to his feet, he knew the full power of the Darkin was his to command.
name: Shadow Scythe

description:
Give <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Kayn</style></link> <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> this round. He starts a free attack <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> an enemy.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Kayn</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Give Kayn Quick Attack this round. He starts a free attack Challenging an enemy.
Create a Kayn in your deck.
flavorText: "No escape." - Kayn
name: Kayn's Shadowstep

description:
<link=vocab.AutoEquip><style=Vocab>Auto-Equip</style></link>: <link=card.equipment><style=AssociatedCard>Corrupted Scythe</style></link>.
When I kill an enemy, fully heal me and heal your Nexus 2.
descriptionRaw:
Auto-Equip: Corrupted Scythe.
When I kill an enemy, fully heal me and heal your Nexus 2.
flavorText: Rhaast let out a triumphant howl. Years of waiting, yearning, and now... he was finally free. He lifted Xolaani’s blades and put them to his tongue, savoring the taste of fresh blood. He closed his eyes in bliss, and a smile crept across his face for the first time in millennia. The reaping had begun.
name: Rhaast

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>The Darkin Scythe</style></link> +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Grant The Darkin Scythe +1|+0.
flavorText:
“Time to reap.”
- Rhaast
name: The Darkin Scythe

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Transform me and all copies of me into <link=card.Rhaast><style=AssociatedCard>Rhaast</style></link> or <link=card.TheShadowAssassin><style=AssociatedCard>The Shadow Assassin</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Transform me and all copies of me into Rhaast or The Shadow Assassin.
flavorText: A fierce and sudden flash of anger overwhelmed Kayn, and a terrible, searing pain passed behind his eyes, bringing him to his knees. Rhaast’s triumphant laughter echoed all around him, mocking and merciless. He had known this day would come--the day he would finally prevail or lose himself to the Darkin...
name: Kayn

description: <link=vocab.AutoEquip><style=Vocab>Auto-Equip</style></link>: <link=card.equipment><style=AssociatedCard>Shadow Scythe</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Auto-Equip: Shadow Scythe.
flavorText: Tremendous power flowed through his veins. Freed from the Darkin’s influence, the full power of the shadows was his to command. Kayn laughed, slipping into darkness, and emerged a moment later only to silently slit the throat of the guard before him.
name: The Shadow Assassin

description: You may put any Cultist cards into your deck during deckbuilding. Once you have summoned 3+ Cultist units, draw a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Kayn</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: You may put any Cultist cards into your deck during deckbuilding. Once you have summoned 3+ Cultist units, draw a Kayn.
flavorText: Only two outcomes are possible: either Kayn bends Rhaast to his will, or he is consumed by it.
name: The Shadow Reaper

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Refill 1 spell mana
descriptionRaw: Attack: Refill 1 spell mana
flavorText: The monks of Hirana send unruly students to the fisherfolk for a lesson in patience. Only a handful ever choose to return to the monastery.
name: Combat Reel

description:
<link=vocab.Origin><style=Vocab>Origin</style></link>: <link=card.origin><style=AssociatedCard>The World Ender</style></link>.
<link=vocab.AutoEquip><style=Vocab>Auto-Equip</style></link>: <link=card.item><style=AssociatedCard>The Darkin Blade</style></link>.
When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link>: Heal your Nexus 2 and create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>World Ender</style></link> in hand if you don't have one.
descriptionRaw:
Origin: The World Ender.
Auto-Equip: The Darkin Blade.
When I'm summoned or strike: Heal your Nexus 2 and create a World Ender in hand if you don't have one.
flavorText: Even across continents, Aatrox felt her awakening. How the hatred still burned. He had already broken her statues, now he could wage a final war against the Coward of Icathia, and through destroying her, end this pitiful existence.
name: Aatrox

description: <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Aatrox</style></link> and an enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
descriptionRaw: Aatrox and an enemy strike each other.
flavorText: "Apocalypse comes!" - Aatrox
name: Deathbringer Descent

flavorText: "By my sword, this world must die." - Aatrox
name: The Darkin Blade

description:
Reduce my cost by 1 for each time an <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> or Darkin ally has struck this game.
<link=vocab.Assimilate><style=Vocab>Assimilate</style></link> allies <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> with Darkin.
descriptionRaw:
Reduce my cost by 1 for each time an Equipped or Darkin ally has struck this game.
Assimilate allies Equipped with Darkin.
flavorText: "Darkin! Awaken!" - Aatrox
name: World Ender

description:
<link=vocab.AutoEquip><style=Vocab>Auto-Equip</style></link>: <link=card.item><style=AssociatedCard>The Darkin Blade</style></link>.
Darkin allies cost 5 less.
When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link>: Heal your Nexus 2.
descriptionRaw:
Auto-Equip: The Darkin Blade.
Darkin allies cost 5 less.
When I'm summoned or strike: Heal your Nexus 2.
flavorText: The battle gathered pace. Xolaani had finally found the courage to face him, and as the two ancient enemies warred, the terrain itself began to wither and bend beneath their fury. An army of celestials descended upon them, desperate to save their dying land--but it was too late. Aatrox would have his day. He would find his peace.
name: Aatrox

description: You may put any non-Champion Darkin into your deck during deckbuilding. Once you've played or summoned 3+ different other Darkin, draw a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Aatrox</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: You may put any non-Champion Darkin into your deck during deckbuilding. Once you've played or summoned 3+ different other Darkin, draw a Aatrox.
flavorText: Peace. Peace through war. Peace through death. Peace through oblivion.
name: The World Ender

description:
<link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Aatrox</style></link> and an enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Deathbringer Descent</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Aatrox and an enemy strike each other.
Create a Deathbringer Descent in hand.
flavorText: "I am the ender of worlds!" - Aatrox
name: Deathbringer Slash

description:
<link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Aatrox</style></link> and an enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Deathbringer Slash</style></link> in hand.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Aatrox</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Aatrox and an enemy strike each other.
Create a Deathbringer Slash in hand.
Create a Aatrox in your deck.
flavorText: "I will break this land!" - Aatrox
name: Aatrox's Deathbringer Sweep

description: Give <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Jax</style></link> <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round and <link=vocab.Forge><style=Vocab>Forge</style></link> him.
descriptionRaw: Give Jax Barrier this round and Forge him.
flavorText: "That's right, eyes on the champ!" - Jax
name: Counter Strike

flavorText: Do NOT wash it with soap. Warm water or magic only.
name: Pan O' Pain

description:
<link=vocab.Origin><style=Vocab>Origin</style></link>: <link=card.origin><style=AssociatedCard>The Arrow of Retribution</style></link>.
<link=vocab.AutoEquip><style=Vocab>Auto-Equip</style></link> <link=card.item><style=AssociatedCard>The Darkin Bow</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Origin: The Arrow of Retribution.
Auto-Equip The Darkin Bow.
flavorText: What if, over time, the man that became the Darkin remembered himself, prompted by the mortal voices within? What if, instead of overcoming those voices entirely, he came to believe in them?
name: Varus

description:
Give an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> and give an ally +1|+0 this round.
Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Chain of Corruption</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Give an enemy Vulnerable and give an ally +1|+0 this round.
Create a Fleeting Chain of Corruption in hand.
flavorText: "Pity those who cross me." - Varus
name: Chain of Corruption

description:
Give an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> and give an ally +1|+0 this round.
Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Chain of Corruption</style></link> in hand. 
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Varus</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Give an enemy Vulnerable and give an ally +1|+0 this round.
Create a Fleeting Chain of Corruption in hand. 
Create a Varus in your deck.
flavorText: "Pity those who cross me." - Varus
name: Varus' Chain of Corruption

description: When you play a spell or <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>equip</style></link> an ally, give me +1|+0 (max +5|+0) until the next time my bearer <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When you play a spell or equip an ally, give me +1|+0 (max +5|+0) until the next time my bearer strikes.
flavorText: Heartlights Kai and Valmar were not the first to bear the bow and host Varus' inhuman power... but they were the first to remind him of his lost humanity.
name: The Darkin Bow

description:
<link=vocab.AutoEquip><style=Vocab>Auto-Equip</style></link> <link=card.item><style=AssociatedCard>The Darkin Bow</style></link>. 
<link=card.item><style=AssociatedCard>The Darkin Bow</style></link> activates twice and has max +10|+0.
descriptionRaw:
Auto-Equip The Darkin Bow. 
The Darkin Bow activates twice and has max +10|+0.
flavorText: Varus was empowered, bolstered, reminded of who he was and what he had yet to become. He embraced the sum of his parts instead of working against them--and when they acted, they acted as one.
name: Varus

description:
You may put any Cultist cards into your deck during deckbuilding.
Once you have played 3+ Cultist spells, draw a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Varus</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
You may put any Cultist cards into your deck during deckbuilding.
Once you have played 3+ Cultist spells, draw a Varus.
flavorText: "We will seek out our betrayers, and we will bring them oblivion." - Varus
name: The Arrow of Retribution

description: Draw 3. Discard any followers drawn.
descriptionRaw: Draw 3. Discard any followers drawn.
flavorText: "If I am to act, I must act now." - Ryze
name: Realm Warp

flavorText: Catch and release is an excellent tactic whether you're fishing or fighting.
name: Fishawhack

description: Give <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Kayn</style></link> <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> this round. He starts a free attack challenging an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Give Kayn Quick Attack this round. He starts a free attack challenging an enemy.
flavorText: "No escape." - Kayn
name: Shadowstep

flavorText: The flavors in this pot are so good it hurts.
name: Pot O' Pain

flavorText: Her spectral guardian bursts from the amulet whenever Fireth is in danger. She seems to have no memory of these events, and aggressively denies its existence when her allies try to explain.
name: Sandworn Amulet

flavorText: This wrench is the only belonging Pesh brought with him when he made the move from Piltover to Bilgewater. It’s not magic or anything, though you might think otherwise when you see him put it to work.
name: The Fix-Em 5000

description:
<link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Aatrox</style></link> and an enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Deathbringer Slash</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Aatrox and an enemy strike each other.
Create a Deathbringer Slash in hand.
flavorText: "I will break this land!" - Aatrox
name: Deathbringer Sweep

flavorText: Fireth says her mother made this rake for her. Exactly where her mother found an artifact of the ancient empire, and exactly why she attached it to a rake, Fireth cannot say.
name: Upcycled Rake

flavorText: Chaska takes a philosophical approach to shepherding. Their flock is whomever happens to be in the vicinity.
name: Shepherd's Authority

description: The first time you <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>equip</style></link> an ally, <link=vocab.Forge><style=Vocab>Forge</style></link> it.
descriptionRaw: The first time you equip an ally, Forge it.
flavorText: Ornn made the living forge many, many years ago, and only went looking for it recently. He never once thought it might go looking for a new owner and wander off on its own.
name: Weaponsmith's Apprentice

description:
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant the top 2 allies in your deck +1|+1.
You may spend 8 mana to play me as <link=card.unit><style=AssociatedCard>Anaakca</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Attack: Grant the top 2 allies in your deck +1|+1.
You may spend 8 mana to play me as Anaakca.
flavorText:
"Warmother, the grip of winter has tightened. The Avarosans have fled beyond their outposts. North is the sea... our only path leads east."
"Do not listen to him, Warmother. That way is the Pale, and beyond it, the whispering wilds. I say better to die than face that cursed land."
"How fortunate for you both that neither must decide my people's fate."
"True, Warmother. But perhaps there is a third way. Let me travel east. Better a scout is lost to darkness than all of our people."
- Warmother Sejuani conferring with her generals
name: The Darkin Spear

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equip</style></link> me with an exact copy of an ally's equipment or the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> equipment from hand.
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: <link=vocab.Forge><style=Vocab>Forge</style></link> me twice.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Equip me with an exact copy of an ally's equipment or the strongest equipment from hand.
Attack: Forge me twice.
levelupDescription: An ally has struck for 8+ damage<style=Variable></style>.
levelupDescriptionRaw: An ally has struck for 8+ damage.
flavorText: If anyone asked Ornn why he had so little patience, he would answer simply that he did have patience. Tremendous patience, in fact, and that was why his work was incomparable. He simply did not have patience for PEOPLE. But nobody asked, and so he never answered.
name: Ornn

description:
<link=vocab.Forge><style=Vocab>Forge</style></link> an ally and deal 1 to all units, then do it again.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Ornn</style></link> in deck.
descriptionRaw:
Forge an ally and deal 1 to all units, then do it again.
Create a Ornn in deck.
flavorText: "An iron will must be forged!" - Ornn
name: Ornn's Bellows Breath

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equip</style></link> me with an exact copy of an ally's equipment or the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> equipment from hand.
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: <link=vocab.Forge><style=Vocab>Forge</style></link> me twice, then summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Spirit of the Ram</style></link> with my stats.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Equip me with an exact copy of an ally's equipment or the strongest equipment from hand.
Attack: Forge me twice, then summon an attacking Spirit of the Ram with my stats.
flavorText: Some believe that when the world truly needs him, the chosen of Ornn will finally be able to find their god. Isn't that just the way of withdrawn, ornery gods? To be found only in the very last place you look?
name: Ornn

flavorText: "What remains after the fire is either forged, or melted. Better to be steel that takes shape than... something that burns away!" - Ornn
name: Spirit of the Ram

description: <link=vocab.Empowered><style=Vocab>Empowered</style></link> 8: <link=keyword.Regeneration><sprite name=Regeneration><style=Keyword>Regeneration</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Empowered 8: Regeneration.
flavorText: While troll aren't typically known for their intellect, they can be surprisingly ingenious.
name: Woolly Snailmoth

description: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy. If you have <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> an ally this game, copy me.
descriptionRaw: Frostbite the strongest enemy. If you have Equipped an ally this game, copy me.
flavorText: Anaakca moved with such speed that the Freljord itself seemed to follow in her wake. Those who survived her butchery soon felt their skin freeze, and their hearts still.
name: The Unforgiving Cold

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Time and Dedication</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Time and Dedication in hand.
flavorText: "My mother told me of Ornn, as her mother told her, and her mother before... and now I will tell you. Listen closely. Do not interrupt. Long ago, across a great, hot, churning sea..."
name: Favored Artisan

description: <link=vocab.Forge><style=Vocab>Forge</style></link> an ally.
descriptionRaw: Forge an ally.
flavorText: "You may be worthy of this. Do not prove me wrong." - Ornn
name: Time and Dedication

description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Time and Dedication</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or Round Start: Create a Fleeting Time and Dedication in hand.
flavorText: Alone in Hearth-Home's forge with nothing but the sound of the molten river's slow coursing below, and the ring of Hammer on anvil... he quite liked that.
name: Ornn's Forge

description:
Get an empty mana gem.
Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Feral Mystic</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Get an empty mana gem.
Summon a Feral Mystic.
flavorText: "The spirits, the stars... again, they bring us together." - Hyara Allseer
name: Wild Mysticism

description: <link=vocab.Empowered><style=Vocab>Empowered</style></link> 3: <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>, <link=keyword.Regeneration><sprite name=Regeneration><style=Keyword>Regeneration</style></link>, and <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Empowered 3: Overwhelm, Regeneration, and Tough.
flavorText: "Come on, you have to take your medicine! You won't feel better 'til you do!" - Ingvar the Younger
name: Pouty Poro

description: When I'm summoned, grant allies +1|+1 for each different subtype you’ve summoned this game. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant allies +1|+1 for each different subtype you’ve summoned this game.
flavorText: "...an' there was a BIG creature that cared for aaaaaaall of the LIL' creatures..." - Ingvar the Younger
name: Warden of the Tribes

description: Deal 1 to EVERYTHING or destroy a unit's equipment.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to EVERYTHING or destroy a unit's equipment.
flavorText: The cold spares nothing and no one.
name: Fracture

description: Give an ally +0|+3 this round. If it's damaged, give it +2|+3 instead.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +0|+3 this round. If it's damaged, give it +2|+3 instead.
flavorText: "Do not worry, little poro. I am with you!" - Braum
name: Here to Help

description: <link=vocab.Forge><style=Vocab>Forge</style></link> an ally and deal 1 to all units, then do it again.
descriptionRaw: Forge an ally and deal 1 to all units, then do it again.
flavorText: "An iron will must be forged!" - Ornn
name: Bellows Breath

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: From the top 6 cards of your deck, summon an attacking follower or non-Champion Darkin and grant it +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Attack: From the top 6 cards of your deck, summon an attacking follower or non-Champion Darkin and grant it +1|+1.
flavorText: With newfound vigor, the great warrior Anaakca sped south through the Freljord and into Demacian lands. The outposts prepared as best they could to repel her assault, but no mere mortal would stand between Anaakca's fury and the coward who stoked it.
name: Anaakca

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant the top 2 allies in your deck +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Grant the top 2 allies in your deck +1|+1.
flavorText:
"Warmother, the grip of winter has tightened to the east. South, the Avarosans have fled beyond their outposts. North is the sea... our only path leads east."
"No, Warmother. That way is the Pale, and beyond it, the whispering wilds. I say better to die than face that cursed land."
"How fortunate for you both that neither must decide my people's fate."
"True, Warmother. But perhaps there is a third way. Let me travel East. Better a scout is lost to darkness than all of our people."
- Warmother Sejuani, conferring with her generals
name: The Darkin Spear

description: The first time I'm <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link>, create a 4 cost copy of me in hand. Grant it the equipment's stats.
descriptionRaw: The first time I'm Equipped, create a 4 cost copy of me in hand. Grant it the equipment's stats.
flavorText: Though he would not admit it, Ornn was quite pleased with the colossi. They served the exact purpose he assigned to them, and best of all, they did not speak.
name: Wrought Colossus

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Forge><style=Vocab>Forge</style></link> an ally and heal it and your Nexus 3.
descriptionRaw: Play: Forge an ally and heal it and your Nexus 3.
flavorText: The Hearthblood were gone, all of them, when Ornn decided to leave the world. Generations passed and their name was all but forgotten. More recently, however, the tales of Ornn resurfaced, and it was whispered that some had begun to return to the way of the Hearthblood.
name: Hearthblood Mender

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Forge><style=Vocab>Forge</style></link> an ally.
descriptionRaw: Play: Forge an ally.
flavorText: When Fiske had first envisioned an apprentice, he imagined someone dedicated, serious about their craft, strong, and capable. Kindra was none of those things. She was prone to daydreaming. She would rather play than work. She was always fussing with that silly little turtle of hers. However... she was learning. That was what mattered.
name: Adept Weaponsmith

description: Deal 1 to EVERYTHING.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to EVERYTHING.
flavorText: The cold spares nothing and no one.
name: Fracture

description: Destroy a unit's equipment.
descriptionRaw: Destroy a unit's equipment.
flavorText: The cold spares nothing and no one.
name: Fracture

description: Heal your Nexus 4 and grant all allies and equipment in your deck +1|+1. Draw 1 of them.
descriptionRaw: Heal your Nexus 4 and grant all allies and equipment in your deck +1|+1. Draw 1 of them.
flavorText: "Come, warm yourself by the fire." - Hearthblood Mender
name: Gift of the Hearthblood

flavorText: "Crunch!" - Tarkaz the Tribeless
name: Bone Club

description: Your <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> allies have <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Your Equipped allies have Overwhelm.
flavorText: The Winter's Claw was right. The Avarosans HAD been too soft. It was time for a new leader, one that would not seek to unify the Freljord through peace, but rule over it.
name: Icevale Cultist

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Plant a <link=card.portal><style=AssociatedCard>Mysterious Portal</style></link> randomly in the top 4 cards of your deck.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Plant a Mysterious Portal randomly in the top 4 cards of your deck.
flavorText: Norra’s worked quickly, thoughts of home in mind. Portalwork was notoriously tricky business, and she hadn’t even had her first cup of tea yet. But Norra loved a good puzzle, especially the type that found her hopelessly lost in pocket dimensions between space and time. She worked faster, thinking fondly of her cat, who would be worried and expecting dinner.
name: Norra

description:
Your <link=card.portal><style=AssociatedCard>Mysterious Portals</style></link> now summon 4, 5, 6, or 7 cost followers instead.
<link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Plant a <link=card.portal><style=AssociatedCard>Mysterious Portal</style></link> randomly in the top 4 cards of your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Your Mysterious Portals now summon 4, 5, 6, or 7 cost followers instead.
Nexus Strike: Plant a Mysterious Portal randomly in the top 4 cards of your deck.
flavorText: With a whiz and a snap, the totem’s various bits and bobs sprang to life, a knick-knack spinning here, a doohickey flashing there. As the room rumbled and groaned, a portal materialized high above, and the vague silhouette of cat ears appeared within. Norra squealed, spilling her tea in delight. Had she finally found the way home?
name: Norra

description: Summon a random 2 or 3 cost follower. If your board is full, create a 0 cost <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> copy in hand instead.
descriptionRaw: Summon a random 2 or 3 cost follower. If your board is full, create a 0 cost Fleeting copy in hand instead.
flavorText: Another mysterious portal... where would this one lead?
name: Mysterious Portal

description:
Plant 2 <link=card.portal><style=AssociatedCard>Mysterious Portals</style></link> randomly in the top 4 cards of your deck. Draw 1.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Norra</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Plant 2 Mysterious Portals randomly in the top 4 cards of your deck. Draw 1.
Create a Norra in your deck.
flavorText:
“I ought to take the Low Roads more often! Silly me, I always forget to mind my head...“
- Norra
name: Norra's Portalpalooza

description: Give an ally with an attachment the stats and keywords of its attachment this round and move the attachment to another ally.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally with an attachment the stats and keywords of its attachment this round and move the attachment to another ally.
flavorText: You’d think a shepherd would have no place on the battlefield, but the skillset has surprising utility. You just have to think about all the combatants as sheep in need of herding.
name: Sharesies

description: Return a <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> or <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spell to hand or destroy a unit's <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipment</style></link>. Draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Return a Fast or Slow spell to hand or destroy a unit's Equipment. Draw 1.
flavorText: "Dear me! Was it this way, that way, or... this-a-that-way? I never can remember!" - Norra
name: Puzzling Signposts

description: When I'm summoned, plant a <link=card.portal><style=AssociatedCard>Mysterious Portal</style></link> randomly in the top 4 cards of your deck.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, plant a Mysterious Portal randomly in the top 4 cards of your deck.
flavorText: Ashane was once a renowned tea maker before finding herself lost in Realm’s End. While experimenting with new flavors, an unfortunate blend of two leaves had put her into a deep sleep--she dreamed strange dreams about odd creatures and impossible structures, silhouetted against an endless horizon. But upon waking, she discovered it had been no dream at all.
name: The Tea Maker

description: Create 3 random 1 cost Poros in hand.
descriptionRaw: Create 3 random 1 cost Poros in hand.
flavorText: "...AN' DEN DA PORO WAS LIKE "HEY YOU I WANNA SNAX TOO!" SO DA POROS GATHERED TOGETHER AT DA GREAT MEETING OF DA POROS TO TALK ABOUT ALL DA PORO PROBLEMS LIKE WHERE ARE DA SNAX AND WHY AREN'T THERE MORE POROS AND..." - Ingvar the Younger
name: Poro Stories

description:
<link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Refill 1 spell mana.
You may spend 8 mana to play me as <link=card.unit><style=AssociatedCard>Baalkux</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Strike: Refill 1 spell mana.
You may spend 8 mana to play me as Baalkux.
flavorText: The bandlewood seemed a perfect place to hide a Darkin weapon, they reasoned. Bandlewoods are, by their very nature, impossible to navigate, and the yordles would know to steer clear of such abject malevolence. But the Targonians failed to realize the efficacy of such strange magic, and the effects it would have over the local flora.
name: The Darkin Staff

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Refill 1 spell mana.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Refill 1 spell mana.
flavorText: The bandlewood seemed a perfect place to hide a Darkin weapon, they reasoned. They are, at their core, impossible to navigate, and the yordles would know to steer clear of such abject malevolence. But the Targonians failed to realize the efficacy of bandle magic, and the effects it would have over the local flora.
name: The Darkin Staff

description: When you spend spell mana, grant me <link=keyword.Impact><sprite name=Impact><style=Keyword>Impact</style></link> for every spell mana you spend.
descriptionRaw: When you spend spell mana, grant me Impact for every spell mana you spend.
flavorText: Baalkux felt the tree's limbs grip the staff inside which he lay dormant. Quickly, he gripped back. His life erupted from the darkin staff and coursed through the tree's ancient boughs and branches. There was no heart to control here. No blood to bend. Baalkux could finally return to his general, and atone for his past transgressions.
name: Baalkux

description:
Once you have <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> an ally this game, I cost 2 less. 
Grow an ally to 4|4 this round.
descriptionRaw:
Once you have Equipped an ally this game, I cost 2 less. 
Grow an ally to 4|4 this round.
flavorText: "There is so much power in us." - Varus
name: The Sudden Surge

description: Plant 2 <link=card.portal><style=AssociatedCard>Mysterious Portals</style></link> randomly in the top 4 cards of your deck. Draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Plant 2 Mysterious Portals randomly in the top 4 cards of your deck. Draw 1.
flavorText:
“I ought to take the Low Roads more often! Silly me, I always forget to mind my head...“
- Norra
name: Portalpalooza

description: Give me +1|+0 for each of your traps or boons that was activated this round.
descriptionRaw: Give me +1|+0 for each of your traps or boons that was activated this round.
flavorText: The magic of papercraft can be somewhat unpredictable. It is as much about the intention that goes into creating something new as the creation's desire to be shaped.
name: Origami Slicer

description: Once you've <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> an ally this game, grant me <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Once you've Equipped an ally this game, grant me Elusive.
flavorText: Person, plant, animal... the Darkin's corruptive influence spares no one and nothing.
name: Blooming Cultist

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Plant a <link=card.portal><style=AssociatedCard>Mysterious Portal</style></link> randomly in the top 4 cards of your deck.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Plant a Mysterious Portal randomly in the top 4 cards of your deck.
flavorText: He’d only been born the day before, but Marv--as Norra affectionally called him--took great pride in serving as her assistant. However, he sternly insisted on being referred to as "junk" and not "trash", as the latter held a negative connotation.
name: Junk Construct

description: When an allied follower transforms into another unit, transform me into an exact copy of it.
descriptionRaw: When an allied follower transforms into another unit, transform me into an exact copy of it.
flavorText: Chameleon see, chameleon be.
name: Curious Changelings

description: When I'm discarded, summon me. When you summon a Mecha-Yordle, grant it a random keyword.
descriptionRaw: When I'm discarded, summon me. When you summon a Mecha-Yordle, grant it a random keyword.
flavorText: Big or small, inanimate or otherwise, if there's a doodad you want found, try Skrappy's! Just don't ask Skrappy where it is, because she is not a believer in cataloguing.
name: Skrappy's Partsapalooza

description: Plant a <link=card.portal><style=AssociatedCard>Mysterious Portal</style></link> randomly in the top 4 cards of your deck and plant a <link=card.chime><style=AssociatedCard>Chime</style></link> on the top card of your deck.
descriptionRaw: Plant a Mysterious Portal randomly in the top 4 cards of your deck and plant a Chime on the top card of your deck.
flavorText: Wandering through the various realms as he pleases, Bard listens, knowing that a great conflict approaches - one that could silence the song of creation.
name: Magical Journey

description: For each ally, plant a <link=card.portal><style=AssociatedCard>Mysterious Portal</style></link> and 3 <link=card.chime><style=AssociatedCard>Chimes</style></link> in the top 10 cards of your deck and plant a <link=card.flashbomb><style=AssociatedCard>Flashbomb Trap</style></link> and 3 <link=card.puffcap><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> on random cards in the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: For each ally, plant a Mysterious Portal and 3 Chimes in the top 10 cards of your deck and plant a Flashbomb Trap and 3 Poison Puffcaps on random cards in the enemy deck.
flavorText:
"Portals, portals, everywhere!"
- Norra
name: Eclectic Collection

description: Each round, the first time one of your traps or boons activate, give all allies +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Impact><sprite name=Impact><style=Keyword>Impact</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Each round, the first time one of your traps or boons activate, give all allies +1|+1 and Impact this round.
flavorText: Gaspar was the first yordle to arrive in Realm’s End. For many years, he wandered alone amidst the twisting paths and portals that all seemed to lead nowhere. Having decided that no one should ever have to do the same, he now helps other lost travelers find their way home.
name: Realm's Caretaker

description: To play, discard 1.
descriptionRaw: To play, discard 1.
flavorText: "Behold! From the ruins of a sunken ferry, I fetched the boxing glove. From the depths of the city they call Zaun, I recovered springs, and from the forges of Demacia, I found metal! This is truly a creation of the world!" - Paparo the Great
name: Mechapulverizer

description: When I'm summoned, if one of your traps or boons has activated this round, draw 1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, if one of your traps or boons has activated this round, draw 1.
flavorText: Considering it his duty to possess immense knowledge, he collects tomes from various travelers who have passed through Realm’s End. Unfortunately, all of this knowledge appears to have gone to his head.
name: Living Library

description:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Meditate</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
Create a Meditate in hand.
flavorText:
"One cut, of many."
- Master Yi
name: Wuju Style

description:
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Dragonling</style></link>. 
You may spend 9 mana to play me as <link=card.unit><style=AssociatedCard>Praa the Breachwalker</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Attack: Summon an attacking Dragonling. 
You may spend 9 mana to play me as Praa the Breachwalker.
flavorText: "In the bridge between worlds, I have long sensed a shadow that pulses with silent rage. Though I know better than to delve into the darkness after it, the pulse has lately grown stronger, faster--and I fear  the creatures of the spirit realm will soon begin searching for it." - Shen
name: The Darkin Fan

description:
<link=vocab.Flow><style=Vocab>Flow</style></link>: I cost 2 less. 
When I'm summoned, draw a spell.
descriptionRaw:
Flow: I cost 2 less. 
When I'm summoned, draw a spell.
flavorText: "Master Doran believed each eye of the Spirit of Wuju offered unique insight into a person's being. But try as I might, all my helm's lenses can behold are different shades of green. What am I missing?" - Lui, Disciple of Doran
name: The Spirit of Wuju

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Navori Brigand</style></link> or give other allies +1|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Navori Brigand or give other allies +1|+1 this round.
flavorText: The longtail first befriended his Brigand pal one winter's evening, as the two shared the remnants of an abandoned campfire. By the week's end, the two had discovered a common sense of mischief, and a strong interest in the golden shine of coin.
name: Navori Longtail

description: <link=vocab.Flow><style=Vocab>Flow</style></link>: I cost 2 less.
descriptionRaw: Flow: I cost 2 less.
flavorText: "Blade and body." - Master Yi
name: Soul Sword

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Recall me and transform me into <link=card.spell><style=AssociatedCard>Shimon Wind</style></link>
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Recall me and transform me into Shimon Wind
flavorText: Ting grinned as the attackers flooded the temple. Finally, a chance to prove himself! First Wukong, then Yi... both had dismissed his talents. Let the others run to find their "master"! He was ready. He was the Shimon Wind.
name: Vastayan Disciple

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Dragonling</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Summon an attacking Dragonling.
flavorText: "In the bridge between worlds, I have long sensed a shadow that pulses with silent rage. Though I know better than to delve into the darkness after it, the pulse has lately grown stronger, faster, and I fear that the creatures of the spirit realm will soon begin searching for it." - Shen
name: The Darkin Fan

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>, and when I transform: Summon two <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copies of me. Grant one <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link>, one <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> and me <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play, and when I transform: Summon two Ephemeral copies of me. Grant one Lifesteal, one Challenger and me Elusive.
flavorText: His general's call stirred him from slumber. As his senses came to him, Praa found himself looking through a weighted veil to a lush, unfamiliar land. Slowly, inexorably, he stepped through the divide, and buried his feet in Runeterra's soil once more. For Aatrox. For victory. For peace. For death.
name: Praa the Breachwalker

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Reduce the cost of a spell in your hand by 1 and <link=vocab.Flow><style=Vocab>Flow</style></link>: Grant all allied <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Master Yis</style></link> <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +2|+0.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Reduce the cost of a spell in your hand by 1 and Flow: Grant all allied Master Yis everywhere +2|+0.
flavorText: Master Yi's mind drifted to the Darkin weapon. Ever since its discovery, he'd been troubled by a terrible sense of foreboding. Some of his students had taken a keen interest–too keen–so he had the curved blades placed under guard, deep within the temple. With some effort, he pushed those thoughts from his mind and continued his meditation. Passing on the teachings of Wuju was all that mattered, and Jun showed great promise.
name: Master Yi

description: The first time I am <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link>, give me <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> and <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: The first time I am Equipped, give me Barrier and Lifesteal this round.
flavorText: At his signal, Jun unleashed a series of blows as precise as any Yi would have made himself. Though he deftly avoided the attack, he bowed before her, pride in his smile.
name: Jun, the Prodigy

description:
<link=vocab.Flow><style=Vocab>Flow</style></link>: I cost 2 less.
<link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw:
Flow: I cost 2 less.
Play: Stun an enemy.
flavorText: What is this one's role in this strange and gruesome show? Ah, more than audience, she is observer, the lens through which all things pass and must be held up against truth and beauty. The Witness!
name: The Witness

description:
When I'm summoned, draw an equipment.
The first time each round an unequipped ally is <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link>, refill 1 spell mana and grant them +1|+0.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, draw an equipment.
The first time each round an unequipped ally is Equipped, refill 1 spell mana and grant them +1|+0.
flavorText:
"Mistfall is sacred ground. The swords at the site have been here for centuries... and it is my belief that any blade left here with a poem on its hilt will invite the spirits of lost wielders to imbue it with their blessing."
- Disciple of Doran, handwritten scroll
name: Mistfall

description: Summon a <link=card.parentRef><style=AssociatedCard>Vastayan Disciple</style></link> and draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Summon a Vastayan Disciple and draw 1.
flavorText: "Whoosh!" - Ting, the Shimon Wind
name: Shimon Wind

description:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
Create <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Meditate</style></link> in hand. Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Master Yi</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
Create Meditate in hand. Create a Master Yi in your deck.
flavorText:
"One cut, of many."
- Master Yi
name: Master Yi's Wuju Style

description:
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: I immediately strike the weakest enemy. 
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Reduce the cost of a spell in your hand by 1 and <link=vocab.Flow><style=Vocab>Flow</style></link>: Grant all allied <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Master Yis</style></link> <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +2|+0.
descriptionRaw:
Attack: I immediately strike the weakest enemy. 
Round Start: Reduce the cost of a spell in your hand by 1 and Flow: Grant all allied Master Yis everywhere +2|+0.
flavorText: From the corner of his eye, Yi saw the flash of steel and heard the unmistakable thud of a lifeless body. Could it have been her? How could he have failed his pupils so utterly? They were untrained and unprepared. But he was a master of Wuju, and neither shame nor shadow would win the day.
name: Master Yi

description: Give an ally +0|+2 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +0|+2 this round.
flavorText: "Form before strength." - Master Yi
name: Meditate

description: Give an ally +1|+0 or +0|+1 this round. If you have <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> an ally this game, play a copy of me on the same target.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +1|+0 or +0|+1 this round. If you have Equipped an ally this game, play a copy of me on the same target.
flavorText: Angry tears streamed down Jun’s face as she surveyed the bodies littering the ground. She had failed them. She had failed her master. And now, only one choice remained…
name: Momentous Choice

description: Give an ally <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round. If it's <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link>, draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally Challenger this round. If it's Equipped, draw 1.
flavorText: Everything's hungry for the right bait.
name: Entrancing Lure

description: Once you've <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> an ally this game, create a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Shadow Fiend</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Once you've Equipped an ally this game, create a Shadow Fiend in hand.
flavorText: In the darkness, he'd seen it - a weapon to cut through the shadows. And in that moment, he heard a voice call to him, distant but powerful. He followed it to Kayn, the truth of its words guiding him.
name: Shadowblade Fanatic

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Stun an enemy.
flavorText: The Kashuri spies are mostly observers, but they are well-equipped in case they are ever attacked.
name: Scintillating Artifact

description: Pick a follower. Summon an exact <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copy of it. If it's an enemy, <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> it.
descriptionRaw: Pick a follower. Summon an exact Ephemeral copy of it. If it's an enemy, Stun it.
flavorText: To the Ionians, wind is the most capricious of the elements. Capricious, but not untamable.
name: Twin Wind Technique

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Navori Brigand</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Navori Brigand.
flavorText: The longtail first befriended his Brigand pal one winter's evening, as the two shared the remnants of an abandoned campfire. By the week's end, the two had discovered a common sense of mischief, and a strong interest in the golden shine of coin.
name: Navori Longtail

description: When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+1 this round.
flavorText: The longtail first befriended his Brigand pal one winter's evening, as the two shared the remnants of an abandoned campfire. By the week's end, the two had discovered a common sense of mischief, and a strong interest in the golden shine of coin.
name: Navori Longtail

description:
<link=vocab.Flow><style=Vocab>Flow</style></link>: I cost 2 less.
<link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> a unit or landmark. If it has any attachments, destroy them first.
descriptionRaw:
Flow: I cost 2 less.
Recall a unit or landmark. If it has any attachments, destroy them first.
flavorText: "You are not worthy of the power you hold." - Rhaast
name: Unworthy Soul

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Preparation</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Preparation in hand.
flavorText:
"I have learned what knowledge I could to continue this sacred art. As for Doran, and his master, and his master before him... I hope their spirits will guide my hammer."
- Disciple of Doran, handwritten scroll
name: Disciple of Doran

description: Reduce the cost of a spell in your hand by 1.
descriptionRaw: Reduce the cost of a spell in your hand by 1.
flavorText:
"A warrior is only as able as they are prepared."
- Wuju words of wisdom
name: Preparation

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: <link=vocab.Flow><style=Vocab>Flow</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>The Empyrean</style></link> and grant it <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Flow: Summon a The Empyrean and grant it Ephemeral.
flavorText: "The shape of the water reflects the shape of your desire. Tell me, wanderer... what do you see?"
name: Dragoncaller

description: Give an ally +0|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +0|+1 this round.
flavorText: …sacrifice.
name: Momentous Choice

description: Give an ally +1|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +1|+0 this round.
flavorText: …violence.
name: Momentous Choice

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Capture</style></link> an ally. When you attack for the first time each round, summon an <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copy of it attacking.
descriptionRaw: Play: Capture an ally. When you attack for the first time each round, summon an Ephemeral copy of it attacking.
flavorText: "What is one life, but a shadow of existence? Embrace the darkness, and you will live forever." - Zed
name: The Black Flame

description: Deal 6 to a unit. If it would die, <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> it instead.
descriptionRaw: Deal 6 to a unit. If it would die, Obliterate it instead.
flavorText: For some creatures, death just isn't enough.
name: Hexbliterator

description: Create a random new 2 cost spell in hand, reduce it's cost by 2 and grant it <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Create a random new 2 cost spell in hand, reduce it's cost by 2 and grant it Fleeting.
flavorText: There's nothing more satisfying than good reverb.
name: Encore

description: When I'm summoned, create a random new 2 cost spell in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a random new 2 cost spell in hand.
levelupDescription: You've played 9+ new spells this game.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've played 9+ new spells this game.
flavorText: Seraphine and her dad never talked about her "secret" trips to the Undercity, or the subtle upgrades she kept making to her stage. She was sure he'd forbid her from participating in Zaun's grungiest musical duel, but one night he tucked the flyer under her door. All she could do was smile, and get to work.
name: Seraphine

description:
Deal 2 to a unit. If you've played 6+ other new spells this game, deal 1 to another unit. <style=Variable></style>
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Seraphine</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 2 to a unit. If you've played 6+ other new spells this game, deal 1 to another unit. 
Create a Seraphine in your deck.
flavorText: Simple and clean.
name: Seraphine's High Note

description:
When I'm summoned, create a random new 2 cost spell in hand.
When you play a new spell that costs 2 or less, copy it with the same targets.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, create a random new 2 cost spell in hand.
When you play a new spell that costs 2 or less, copy it with the same targets.
flavorText: She'd never heard anything like it--maybe nobody had. Together, on that stage, they made something new.
name: Seraphine

description:
When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Back Alley Barkeep</style></link>.
Your new cards cost 1 less.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, summon a Back Alley Barkeep.
Your new cards cost 1 less.
flavorText: After drying the last of the glasses, the barkeep took a moment to look over his place. This spot, this home from home, had seen so many strangers become friends, and wore the graffiti and dents from many a wild night. The barkeep smiled to himself. It wasn't a perfect place, but it was his.
name: Back Alley Bar

description: You may spend 8 mana to play me as <link=card.unit><style=AssociatedCard>Styraatu</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: You may spend 8 mana to play me as Styraatu.
flavorText: As the Targonians pondered where they should scatter the Darkin weapons, one of their kind suggested the lands that would become known as Zaun. Buried deep within the walls of the cavernous and winding passageways would be perfect, they assumed. Far from human reach. But not Chirean.
name: The Darkin Harp

description: Deal 2 to a unit. If you've played 6+ other new spells this game, deal 1 to another unit. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to a unit. If you've played 6+ other new spells this game, deal 1 to another unit.
flavorText: Simple and clean.
name: High Note

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Create a random new 2 cost spell in hand.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Create a random new 2 cost spell in hand.
flavorText: Once, he'd dreamed of leaving Zaun and traveling the world with a song in his heart. Now, the world was asleep in her room, waiting for the songs tomorrow might bring.
name: Acoustician

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a spell that costs 5 and set its cost to 2.
descriptionRaw: Play: Manifest a spell that costs 5 and set its cost to 2.
flavorText: "It's not about how big your voice is, it's about how big your heart is!" - Fanclub President
name: Fanclub President

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Create a new 2 cost spell in hand and give it <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Create a new 2 cost spell in hand and give it Fleeting.
flavorText:
"Oh dear, sounds like rain."
"Huh? Dad, it's so bright outside."
"Quick, cover the blueprints! It's a BRAINstorm!"
"Daaaaad."
- Seraphine & her father
name: Inspired Plans

flavorText: As the Targonians pondered where they should scatter the Darkin weapons, one of their kind suggested the lands that would become known as Zaun. Buried deep within the walls of the cavernous and winding passageways would be perfect, they assumed. Far from human reach. But not Chirean.
name: The Darkin Harp

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Draw 2, then reduce those cards' costs by 2.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Draw 2, then reduce those cards' costs by 2.
flavorText: Styraatu burst through the processing plant, furious and impatient. Her rage was known even before the tendrils of madness found their way into her mind, but now... now she would make them all pay. First here, in this land of technology, then south, where she would war alongside her general once again.
name: Styraatu

description: When I'm summoned, if I was created, draw 1 and grant me +2|+1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, if I was created, draw 1 and grant me +2|+1.
flavorText: When they're not sleeping in the middle of the day or throwing up in the middle of the night, cats are always up to some brand of mischief.
name: Cunning Kitten

description: Once you've <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> an ally this game, create a new spell that costs 2 in hand and set its cost to 0.
descriptionRaw: Once you've Equipped an ally this game, create a new spell that costs 2 in hand and set its cost to 0.
flavorText: "I have always been willing to sacrifice in the name of science. No matter the personal risk, the limitless, inexhaustible power I gained through the exchange was more than reward."
name: Ambitious Cultist

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to all enemies. If you've played 6+ new spells this game, deal 3 instead. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Play: Deal 1 to all enemies. If you've played 6+ new spells this game, deal 3 instead.
flavorText: "Zaun! I hope you're ready to scream, 'cause we're about to sink this place all over again!" - Zaun Diva
name: The Zaun Diva

description: Deal 1 to all enemies. If you've played 6+ new spells this game, deal 3 instead.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to all enemies. If you've played 6+ new spells this game, deal 3 instead.
flavorText: "The Diva's show is totally worth the hearing damage!" - Fans, probably
name: Fatal Encore

description:
<link=vocab.Flow><style=Vocab>Flow</style></link>: I cost 1 less.
Deal 1 to all enemies.
descriptionRaw:
Flow: I cost 1 less.
Deal 1 to all enemies.
flavorText: It takes a special sound to break through Zaun's rattle and clang, but the Diva always delivers.
name: Caustic Riff

description:
Draw 2.
<link=vocab.Flow><style=Vocab>Flow</style></link>: Reduce those cards' costs by 2.
descriptionRaw:
Draw 2.
Flow: Reduce those cards' costs by 2.
flavorText: Music's all about timing, but once in a while you've gotta just let loose.
name: Drum Solo

description:
Give an ally +2|+0 and <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> this round.
<link=vocab.Flow><style=Vocab>Flow</style></link>: Create a new 2 cost spell in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally +2|+0 and Quick Attack this round.
Flow: Create a new 2 cost spell in hand.
flavorText: "I can't hear you, Zaun!" - Seraphine
name: Crowd Pleaser

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Reduce the cost of the most expensive spell in your hand by 1.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Reduce the cost of the most expensive spell in your hand by 1.
flavorText: You wouldn't find his name on any of the blueprints, or credited in any of the songs, but those in the know agreed: Acorn was the heart of the whole operation.
name: Acorn, the Hextechnician

description: Deal 1 to a unit. If you have <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> an ally this game, copy me with the same targets.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to a unit. If you have Equipped an ally this game, copy me with the same targets.
flavorText: If discord be the cacophony of destruction, then butcher on.
name: The Violent Dischord

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: <link=vocab.Flow><style=Vocab>Flow</style></link>: Refill 2 spell mana.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Flow: Refill 2 spell mana.
flavorText: If he had things his way, NOBODY would get in.
name: Zaun Bouncer

description: Your spells and skills deal 1 extra damage.
descriptionRaw: Your spells and skills deal 1 extra damage.
flavorText:
"Location: Sector 3, Underway 19B
Item: Illegal Firearm
Notes: Confiscated during Operation: Sumplight. Weapon is highly dangerous. Handle with extreme care."
- Piltover Warden field report
name: Gatalyst v1.0

description: When I'm summoned, I <link=vocab.Improvise><style=Vocab>Improvise</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, I Improvise.
flavorText: Pesh met Jax in a dockside brawl, and their timely escape was more convenience than partnership. But Pesh has been ferrying Jax about ever since, because things break around Jax, and if there’s one thing Pesh likes more than a good scrap, it’s a break in need of fixing.
name: Piltovan Castaway

description: Destroy a unit's equipment and deal 2 to it.
descriptionRaw: Destroy a unit's equipment and deal 2 to it.
flavorText: "WHO THROWS AN ANCHOR IN A BAR FIGHT?! WHAT IS WRONG WITH YOU LOT?!!" - Bilgewater Bartender
name: Heavy Metal

description: To play, discard 1. Draw 2 and if you discarded an equipment, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Icathian Mirage</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: To play, discard 1. Draw 2 and if you discarded an equipment, summon a Icathian Mirage.
flavorText: Jax’s crew is proof that a whole can be greater than the sum of its parts. Still, Pesh insists on a different philosophy: sometimes, parts are pretty great on their own.
name: Parts Made Whole

description:
Once you have <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> an ally this game, I cost 2 less.
Draw 2 and give them <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Once you have Equipped an ally this game, I cost 2 less.
Draw 2 and give them Fleeting.
flavorText: Though Ibaaros' old bones moved slow, the waters that surged ahead of him moved at an almost incomprehensible speed.
name: The Unending Wave

description: When <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> allies attack, deal 1 to the enemy nexus.
descriptionRaw: When Equipped allies attack, deal 1 to the enemy nexus.
flavorText: It didn't matter where the power came from--her goddess would not care. What mattered was the glory it would bring her through the monsters she slayed.
name: Buhru Cultist

description:
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Draw 1 at next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link> and give it <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>. 
You may spend 8 mana to play me as <link=card.unit><style=AssociatedCard>Ibaaros</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Attack: Draw 1 at next Round Start and give it Fleeting. 
You may spend 8 mana to play me as Ibaaros.
flavorText:
"Steer clear, steer clear, of the strait of Daray,
Where the waters whisper and the winds betray,
Where sea beast and bird so seldom foray,
For fear o' the darkness deep 'neath the strait of Daray."
- Bilgewater rhyme
name: The Darkin Harpoon

description: I have +1|+1 for each card you've drawn this game. I can only be blocked by enemies with 4 or more Power.
descriptionRaw: I have +1|+1 for each card you've drawn this game. I can only be blocked by enemies with 4 or more Power.
flavorText: Ibaaros, the Champion of the Dunes, lifted himself through the water. His blood coursed with that same familiar yearning from years before. To serve. To obey. To submit.
name: Ibaaros

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Draw 1 at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link> and grant it <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Draw 1 at the next Round Start and grant it Fleeting.
flavorText:
"Steer clear, steer clear, of the strait of Daray,
Where the waters whisper and the winds betray,
Where sea beast and bird so seldom foray,
For fear o' the darkness deep 'neath the strait of Daray."
