- Bilgewater rhyme
name: The Darkin Harpoon

description: Give an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round. If it dies this round, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Give an enemy Vulnerable this round. If it dies this round, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Will you stand, or cower?" - Illaoi
name: Test of Spirit

description: <link=keyword.Plunder><style=Keyword>Plunder</style></link>: I cost 2 less.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: I cost 2 less.
flavorText:
"Like the saying goes, nothin' ends a Bilgewater quarrel faster than a cutlass."
"Except maybe a pistol."
"Shut up, Baz."
- Baz and Gav, aspiring bounty hunters
name: Jagged Cutlass

description: Deal 2 to a unit. Draw 1 at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link> for each damage dealt and give them <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to a unit. Draw 1 at the next Round Start for each damage dealt and give them Fleeting.
flavorText: "Rex'll take care of the boom, don't you worry - an' I'll take care of the treasure. I'll take care of Rex's share too, elsewise he'll try to put it in the cannon, an' that's always a mess." - Petty Officer
name: Loaded Vessel

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: <link=vocab.Spawn><style=Vocab>Spawn</style></link> 2.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Spawn 2.
flavorText: "Stand strong beneath Her gaze!" - Illaoi
name: Eye of God

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Draw 1 and give it <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Draw 1 and give it Fleeting.
flavorText: "Nasty, thievin' little monsters, they are. Easy enough to spot 'em when they've filched somethin', at least."
name: Wily Newtfish

description: Deal 1 to the enemy nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to the enemy nexus.
flavorText: Yes... this weapon will certainly please Mother Serpent.
name: Piercing Bolt

description: <link=vocab.Empowered><style=Vocab>Empowered</style></link> 5: <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Empowered 5: Overwhelm.
flavorText: "Ah, I see it now... the shapes left in the mountain were merely imprints--conduits for the beings from the realm beyond the stars..." - Lorekeeper Skai'en
name: Seraphic Wyvern

description: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> an ally and create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Corrupted Form</style></link> with its stats.
descriptionRaw: Obliterate an ally and create a Corrupted Form with its stats.
flavorText: The fallen god-warriors entombed in these weapons could not be easily defeated, and so instead were contained.
name: Seal In Steel

flavorText: While the Darkin were entombed in the weapons they carried, they slowly changed until they resembled nothing of their original form.
name: Corrupted Form

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> enemies with less Power than me.
descriptionRaw: Play: Stun enemies with less Power than me.
flavorText: "I fear the day has finally come... Justice returns on golden wings, and with her she brings a shining army!" - Lorekeeper Skai'en
name: Lawkeeper

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> enemies with less Power than me.
descriptionRaw: Stun enemies with less Power than me.
flavorText: "Gaze upon its golden light and know judgment!" - Mihira, Aspect of Justice
name: Blinding Light

description:
<link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Grant allies in play and in hand +1|+1.
<link=vocab.Empowered><style=Vocab>Empowered</style></link> 5: <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>, <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link>, and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Round End: Grant allies in play and in hand +1|+1.
Empowered 5: Elusive, Lifesteal, and Overwhelm.
flavorText: "Some revere the Aspects as gods. Others see them as messengers from the realm beyond. Still others fear them... and perhaps rightly so." - Lorekeeper Skai'en
name: Mihira, Aspect of Justice

description:
Give an ally "I can't take damage or die" this round. 
Give all allies +1|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally "I can't take damage or die" this round. 
Give all allies +1|+0 this round.
flavorText: "Shielded by righteous flame!" - Kayle
name: Divine Judgment

description: <link=vocab.Empowered><style=Vocab>Empowered</style></link> 3: <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Empowered 3: Elusive.
flavorText: "Yes... I recognize you. The message you bear... it can only be a summons." - Ryze
name: Winged Messenger

description: Grant an ally in hand +3|+3 and another +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally in hand +3|+3 and another +2|+2.
flavorText: "Evil shall burn!" - Kayle
name: Purifying Flames

description:
<link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Give <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link> allies +1|+1 this round.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Grant <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link> allies +1|+0.
descriptionRaw:
Daybreak: Give Daybreak allies +1|+1 this round.
Nightfall: Grant Nightfall allies +1|+0.
flavorText: In the twilight hours and just before sunrise the owl can be heard, its call a reminder of the liminal places between dusk and dawn.
name: Twilit Protector

description:
I have +1|+0 for each time an ally attacked with increased Power.
When I'm summoned, grant other allies +1|+0.
<link=vocab.Empowered><style=Vocab>Empowered</style></link> 6: <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
I have +1|+0 for each time an ally attacked with increased Power.
When I'm summoned, grant other allies +1|+0.
Empowered 6: Quick Attack.
flavorText: "The Demacians know her as the Winged Protector, but those of us who live under the vault of stars in Targon know her as the daughter of Justice, bearing divine purpose and a sword of starfire." - Lorekeeper Skai'en
name: Kayle

description:
I have +1|+0 for each time an ally attacked with increased Power.
When I'm summoned or level up, grant other allies +1|+1.
<link=vocab.Empowered><style=Vocab>Empowered</style></link> 16: <link=keyword.Double Strike><sprite name=DoubleStrike><style=Keyword>Double Attack</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
I have +1|+0 for each time an ally attacked with increased Power.
When I'm summoned or level up, grant other allies +1|+1.
Empowered 16: Double Attack.
flavorText: "We would surely know her to see her, should she ever return... but I worry there is little reason for her to do so beyond a threat so dire that it requires her interference." - Lorekeeper Skai'en
name: Kayle

description:
Give an ally "I can't take damage or die" this round. 
Give all allies +1|+0 this round.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Kayle</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally "I can't take damage or die" this round. 
Give all allies +1|+0 this round.
Create a Kayle in your deck.
flavorText: "Shielded by righteous flame!" - Kayle
name: Kayle's Divine Judgment

description:
I have +2|+2 for each ally that died with its power increased.
<link=vocab.Empowered><style=Vocab>Empowered</style></link> 16: Transform me into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Xolaani, Aspect's Bane</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
I have +2|+2 for each ally that died with its power increased.
Empowered 16: Transform me into Xolaani, Aspect's Bane.
flavorText: Xolaani watched on as Anaakco fell to his knees, subjugated by the very enemy he sought so desperately to destroy. Slowly, the beat of his heart rang out in unison with the others. Another heart to control. Another body to command.
name: Xolaani the Bloodweaver

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Pick an ally, it <link=vocab.Improvise><style=Vocab>Improvises</style></link>. If you don't, I <link=vocab.Improvise><style=Vocab>Improvise</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Pick an ally, it Improvises. If you don't, I Improvise.
flavorText: Jax helped Chaska rescue their herd from rampaging faefolk. Then, Chaska rescued Jax from rampaging faefolk. They travel together whenever one of them doesn’t wander off.
name: Wandering Shepherd

description: <link=vocab.Empowered><style=Vocab>Empowered</style></link> 3: <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Empowered 3: Lifesteal.
flavorText: "It is said that when Mihira left this place, she left a part of herself behind--a holy flame, burning brightly. For years, my family has tended to that fire, keeping it lit in the hopes that she may yet return."
name: Divine Clerk

description:
Once you have <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> an ally this game, I cost 2 less.
Give an ally <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw:
Once you have Equipped an ally this game, I cost 2 less.
Give an ally SpellShield this round.
flavorText: Look to the night sky and focus your eyes on a small swathe of the firmament. Now imagine all those lived within it, all the knowledge gained and all the experiences lived over countless millennia. Imagine all that information condensed into a shard that could fit into the palm of your hand. Think of how much wisdom you would hold. How much power.
name: The Expanse's Protection

description: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> a unit or landmark. Heal your Nexus 3.
descriptionRaw: Obliterate a unit or landmark. Heal your Nexus 3.
flavorText: "Who would arrive in our hour of need?" - Shuriman Elder
name: Celestial Impact

description: My bearer is a Dragon.
descriptionRaw: My bearer is a Dragon.
flavorText: Many call upon the might of dragons, though it manifests differently across Runeterra. Those that invoke the power of a celestial dragon may discover they possess an inner strength that burns as bright and hot as a star.
name: Draconic Bands

description:
<link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Grant my supported ally +1|+1.
You may spend 8 mana to play me as <link=card.unit><style=AssociatedCard>Horazi</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Support: Grant my supported ally +1|+1.
You may spend 8 mana to play me as Horazi.
flavorText: Perhaps those who imprisoned the Darkin thought that burying the legendary warrior Horazi within an orb of star metal would sufficiently dim her irascible will. But as her general stirred, so too did Horazi, who found that even Targon's ancient protectors could be tempted by promises whispered from afar.
name: The Darkin Lodestone

description: <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Grow my supported ally's stats to mine. Give it my positive keywords this round.
descriptionRaw: Support: Grow my supported ally's stats to mine. Give it my positive keywords this round.
flavorText: Horazi was gifted a higher perspective in the burning celestial matter that imprisoned her. She glimpsed the secrets of the cosmos, and of the infinite passage of time that preceded and followed her existence. She learned so much, and yet her hatred for the coward Xolaani remained.
name: Horazi

description: <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Grant my supported ally +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Support: Grant my supported ally +1|+1.
flavorText: Perhaps those who imprisoned the Darkin thought that burying the legendary warrior Horazi within an orb of star metal would sufficiently dim her irascible will. But as her general stirred, so too did Horazi, who found that even Targon's ancient protectors could be tempted by promises whispered from afar.
name: The Darkin Lodestone

description:
I have +2|+2 for each ally that died with its power increased.
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Transform attacking non-Darkin followers into exact copies of me.
descriptionRaw:
I have +2|+2 for each ally that died with its power increased.
Attack: Transform attacking non-Darkin followers into exact copies of me.
flavorText: More. More. Even the great hero of legend Mihira could not withstand Xolaani's overwhelming strength. The earth seemed to shudder to one beat now, such was the hemomantic power growing within Xolaani. She took a moment to observe the battlefield, and wept with the joy filling her soul. Soon, this world would be united in peace. In love. In silence.
name: Xolaani, Aspect's Bane

description: Grant an ally in play and an ally in hand +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally in play and an ally in hand +1|+1.
flavorText: "By divine grace." - Kayle
name: Celestial Blessing

description: When I'm summoned or once you've <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> an ally this game, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Gem</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or once you've Equipped an ally this game, create a Gem in hand.
flavorText: She sought an end to the conflict between Sun and Moon, day and night. The bow offered power, though it came with a terrible cost - yet she pledged herself to it anyway, hoping that it would stop the war once and for all.
name: Lunari Cultist

description: The first time I'm <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> grant me +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: The first time I'm Equipped grant me +2|+2.
flavorText: Long did these devoted few tend their lady's temples. Long did they sweep back the sands and expel would-be desecrators. Long did they pray for her return. Her kindness. Her control.
name: Darkinthrall

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>LastBreath</style></link>: If my bearer is not a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Darkinthrall</style></link>, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Darkinthrall</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: LastBreath: If my bearer is not a Darkinthrall, summon a Darkinthrall.
name: The Darkin Bloodletters

description: <link=keyword.Countdown><style=Keyword>Countdown 2</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Treasure of the Sands</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Countdown 2: Create a Treasure of the Sands in hand.
flavorText:
"Why must you touch everything?"
"What, you think it's booby-trapped? You think some boulder's just gonna come rollin' outta–"
"RUNNN!"
- Argus and Silvio, tomb robbers
name: Buried Armory

description: When you <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slay</style></link> a unit, reduce the cost of the next Darkin Unit you play by 1.
descriptionRaw: When you slay a unit, reduce the cost of the next Darkin Unit you play by 1.
flavorText: The altar throbbed with life once more, shaking the sands around it with a slow and steady beat. Each of Xolaani's disciples felt the same beat deep in their heart. Every muscle, every thought, every moment... they were all hers to control.
name: The Altar of Blood

description:
When you summon an ally, <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> your highest <link=keyword.Countdown><style=Keyword>Countdown</style></link> landmark 1 round.
When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Hibernating Rockbear</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
When you summon an ally, advance your highest Countdown landmark 1 round.
When I'm summoned, summon a Hibernating Rockbear.
flavorText: "The rockdoubbs treat Sadira like one of their own. She'd run away with 'em in a heartbeat if I let her, the little scamp!" - Kadira, Desert Naturalist
name: Rockbear Shepherd

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Ruinous Acolyte</style></link> in hand. When you destroy me create an <link=card.selfref><style=AssociatedCard>Acolyte's Reliquary</style></link> in the top 5 cards of your deck.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Ruinous Acolyte in hand. When you destroy me create an Acolyte's Reliquary in the top 5 cards of your deck.
flavorText: "Our hands shape the desert!" - Ruinous Acolyte
name: Acolyte's Reliquary

description: <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>. Give a unit "I take double damage and if I would die, <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> me instead" this round.
descriptionRaw: Predict. Give a unit "I take double damage and if I would die, Obliterate me instead" this round.
flavorText: "Only fools seek power beyond their control." - Xerath
name: Curse of the Tomb

description: When you summon an ally or an ally dies, grant each of its positive keywords to 3 allies in your deck.
descriptionRaw: When you summon an ally or an ally dies, grant each of its positive keywords to 3 allies in your deck.
flavorText: The Hive Herald raised two hands to the colossal structure above. "A THRONE," he screamed, "FOR AN EMPRESS." The void gate above pulsed with life. Soon.
name: Void Gate

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>. If you pick a Darkin or an equipment, grant me +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Play: Predict. If you pick a Darkin or an equipment, grant me +1|+1.
flavorText: In his hand he clutched a braided belt, a gift from his friend Rhaast before their Ascension ceremony - but even as he revered the Darkin’s power, he harbored a secret resentment in his beastly heart.
name: Forsaken Baccai

description: Once you have <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>equipped</style></link> an ally this game, I cost 2 less. Revive the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> dead allied champion.
descriptionRaw: Once you have equipped an ally this game, I cost 2 less. Revive the Strongest dead allied champion.
flavorText:
“You’ll never die, because I’ll never let you.”
- Xolaani
name: Heedless Resurrection

description:
<link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: I <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> an enemy.
<style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Play: I strike an enemy.
flavorText: As the assault continued, larger and even more ferocious creatures poured from the widening gate. The city of Belveth was lost, though, as the cruelty of fate would have it, its name would live on.
name: Camouflaged Horror

description:
<link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: If my bearer is not a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Darkinthrall</style></link>, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Darkinthrall</style></link>.
You may spend 6 mana and kill an ally to play me as <link=card.unit><style=AssociatedCard>Xolaani</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Last Breath: If my bearer is not a Darkinthrall, summon a Darkinthrall.
You may spend 6 mana and kill an ally to play me as Xolaani.
flavorText: As the fighting raged on, Jun, desperate and badly wounded, turned to the voice whispering in her thoughts. "You will never die," it said, soft as summer rain, "because I will never let you."
name: The Darkin Bloodletters

flavorText:
"Put those down, Silvio!"
"Why? It ain't like the poor bugger's coming back for 'em!"
"Some things should stay buried." 
- Argus and Silvio, tomb robbers
name: Treasure of the Sands

description:
To play me, kill an ally.
<link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>The Darkin Bloodletters</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
To play me, kill an ally.
Last Breath: Create a The Darkin Bloodletters in hand.
flavorText: Shurima's Ascended were doomed the moment they took up arms against the Void. This was an enemy that could never be beaten, and while the god-warriors were all but guaranteed immortality, their minds were never as resilient. Madness consumed them all. Xolaani, once a beloved and gifted healer, began using her hemomantic powers to control her brethren, and soon enough, the hatred between her and Aatrox boiled over into civil war.
name: Xolaani

description: <link=card.parentRef><style=AssociatedCard>Camouflaged Horror</style></link> <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Camouflaged Horror strikes an enemy.
flavorText: With each corpse, the Void grew. Knowledge. Matter. Perspective. It began to feel. It began to want.
name: Feed the Void

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Lucky Find</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Create a Lucky Find in hand.
flavorText: "Chase what you want. Without mercy." - Ruin Runner
name: Swinging Glaive

description: Give an ally +1|+1 this round or <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>equip</style></link> it with an equipment in hand that costs 2 or less.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +1|+1 this round or equip it with an equipment in hand that costs 2 or less.
flavorText: This move is more painful if the party hasn't eaten yet.
name: Catch!

description: When I'm summoned, give <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> allies <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, give Equipped allies Barrier this round.
flavorText: "The boy is a liability. I was adamant he should not be taken along on our hunt, as still he refers to the foul creature as his 'sister'. It is a naivete so profound, it is frankly revolting. Yet, I suppose I do pity him well enough. At the very least, this will be an important lesson for him." - From the personal journal of Sirius Rowill, Zealous Ranger-Knight
name: Kind-hearted Recruit

description: Destroy a unit's equipment, and if it's a follower, <link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> it.
descriptionRaw: Destroy a unit's equipment, and if it's a follower, Silence it.
flavorText: "You've brought this upon yourself." - Lord Eldred, Mageseeker Leader
name: Silence and Suppress

description: Give allies +4|+4 this round. If you have the attack token, give them <link=keyword.Scout><sprite name=Scout><style=Keyword>Scout</style></link> this round. Otherwise, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Give allies +4|+4 this round. If you have the attack token, give them Scout this round. Otherwise, Rally.
flavorText: "Into battle with hearts aglow!" - Lux
name: Champions' Strength

description: You may spend 5 mana to play me as <link=card.unit><style=AssociatedCard>Joraal</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: You may spend 5 mana to play me as Joraal.
flavorText:
"My son, listen now. That shield must never be touched. Long ago, it was gifted to our house on the condition that we keep it safe, and leave it be. It is my responsibility, and when I pass, it will be yours. Do you hear me now? You must never climb to it again. You must never touch it."
"But mama, the voice inside... it cries to me. It sounds so sad."
"...All the more reason, my son."
- Lady Fortis and her son
name: The Darkin Aegis

description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Tumble</style></link> in hand or if you have one, reduce its cost by 1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or Round Start: Create a Tumble in hand or if you have one, reduce its cost by 1.
flavorText: "Our target was once human, which means it's smarter than your average beast. One wrong move could spell death for us all. Stay within eyesight of one another, call out anything suspicious--but above all else, remember..."
name: Vayne

description: <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equip</style></link> an ally with an equipment in hand that costs 2 or less. It starts a free attack.
descriptionRaw: Equip an ally with an equipment in hand that costs 2 or less. It starts a free attack.
flavorText: "I bring swift death." - Vayne
name: Tumble

description:
If you've attacked 2+ times this round, I cost 5 less.
An ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Vayne</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
If you've attacked 2+ times this round, I cost 5 less.
An ally strikes an enemy.
Create a Vayne in your deck.
flavorText: "Purifying bolts." - Vayne
name: Vayne's Condemn

description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a 0 cost <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Tumble</style></link> in hand or if you have one, reduce its cost to 0.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or Round Start: Create a 0 cost Tumble in hand or if you have one, reduce its cost to 0.
flavorText: "...shoot to kill."
name: Vayne

description: Your opponent's spells cost 2 more while I am attacking.
descriptionRaw: Your opponent's spells cost 2 more while I am attacking.
flavorText: A mighty Ascended tactician known as the Aegis of Eternity, Joraal seemed impervious to attack, even for the immortal god-warriors of Shurima. But the war against the Void raged on, and as resilient as Joraal's body was, it was his mind that broke. And how it broke.
name: Joraal

flavorText:
"My son, listen now. That shield must never be touched. Long ago, it was gifted to our house on the condition that we keep it safe, and leave it be. It is my responsibility, and when I pass, it will be yours. Do you hear me now? You must never climb to it again. You must never touch it."
"But mama, the voice inside... it cries to me. It sounds so sad."
"...All the more reason, my son."
- Lady Fortis and her son
name: The Darkin Aegis

description:
If you've attacked 2+ times this round, I cost 5 less.
An ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw:
If you've attacked 2+ times this round, I cost 5 less.
An ally strikes an enemy.
flavorText: "Purifying bolts." - Vayne
name: Condemn

description: Create an <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Icathian Mirage</style></link> in hand that costs 0 this round, or create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Golden Spatula</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Create an Icathian Mirage in hand that costs 0 this round, or create a Golden Spatula in hand.
flavorText:
Legends say the original wielder of the Golden Spatula was a marine creature of outstanding culinary prowess--one who sought to become a warrior as strong and fearless as Jax.

Other, more credible legends say that particular legend was fabricated entirely by a certain cook who was very, VERY lost in the sauce.
name: Icathian Myths

description: I don't take damage from enemy spells or skills.
descriptionRaw: I don't take damage from enemy spells or skills.
flavorText: "Nothing is stronger than petricite." - Durand Architect
name: Petricite Charger

description: An ally and an enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other, or an <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy, then is unequipped.
descriptionRaw: An ally and an enemy strike each other, or an Equipped ally strikes an enemy, then is unequipped.
flavorText: "Fish, meet face!" - Ionian Hookmaster
name: Fish Fight

description: The first time you summon another Elite, grant me +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: The first time you summon another Elite, grant me +2|+2.
flavorText: "She's not as fast as a silverwing, but you'd be surprised how fast her little legs can carry her." - Cithria, Lady of Clouds
name: Trusty Ramhound

description: Pick a follower or equipment from the top 4 cards of your deck. Draw it, place the rest into your deck.
descriptionRaw: Pick a follower or equipment from the top 4 cards of your deck. Draw it, place the rest into your deck.
flavorText: Soft, enticing whispers plant desire deep within the heart. Like a splinter, this festers and grows into hunger. Hunger gives way to transgression, which in turn brings death. And so the cycle continues.
name: Tempting Prospect

description: An ally and an enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
descriptionRaw: An ally and an enemy strike each other.
flavorText: "Fish, meet face!" - Ionian Hookmaster
name: Fish Fight

description: An <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy, then is unequipped.
descriptionRaw: An Equipped ally strikes an enemy, then is unequipped.
flavorText: "Fish, meet face!" - Ionian Hookmaster
name: Fish Fight

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equip</style></link> me with an equipment that costs 2 or less from hand. 
The first time I would die while <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link>, fully heal me and destroy the equipment instead.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Equip me with an equipment that costs 2 or less from hand. 
The first time I would die while Equipped, fully heal me and destroy the equipment instead.
flavorText:
"Kian, if you're reading this... I'm hopefully dead. I can't control what's happening to me. The blood under my nails won't wash off. I'm so itchy. I scratch and scratch but nothing helps. It hurts. I just want it to stop. If I'm still alive somehow, promise me you'll stop trying to find me.

I would ask for forgiveness, but I don't deserve it. Be good to mother, okay?"
- Crumpled letter found in a torn-up satchel
name: Bloodcursed Harpy

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> allies +1|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Give Equipped allies +1|+1 this round.
flavorText:
"Janan, was it? What can you tell me about Sirius?"
"Oh, Ranger-Knight Rowill? A few years ago, he had his title revoked. Apparently, he willfully disregarded every order he was given. Seems he does whatever he wants and doesn't take 'no' for an answer."
"Ah."
"So... why did you let him join this hunt, anyway?"
"I didn't."
"Then, why... oh, right. Fantastic."
- Vayne and Janan, Widowed Huntress
name: Zealous Ranger-Knight

description: Create an <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Icathian Mirage</style></link> in hand that costs 0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Create an Icathian Mirage in hand that costs 0 this round.
flavorText:
Legends say the original wielder of the golden spatula was a marine creature of outstanding culinary prowess--one who sought to become a warrior as strong and fearless as Jax.

Other, more credible legends say that particular legend was fabricated entirely by a certain cook who was very, VERY lost in the sauce.
name: Icathian Myths

description: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Golden Spatula</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Create a Golden Spatula in hand.
flavorText:
Legends say the original wielder of the golden spatula was a marine creature of outstanding culinary prowess--one who sought to become a warrior as strong and fearless as Jax.

Other, more credible legends say that particular legend was fabricated entirely by a certain cook who was very, VERY lost in the sauce.
name: Icathian Myths

flavorText: It definitely does something.
name: Golden Spatula

description: Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Icathian Mirages</style></link> <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> with up to 2 <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipment</style></link> in hand that cost 2 or less.
descriptionRaw: Summon 2 Icathian Mirages Equipped with up to 2 Equipment in hand that cost 2 or less.
flavorText: Jax has spent countless dreams fighting alongside his lost kin. Some battles they win, some they lose, but always, they are together.
name: Roar of Icathia

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equip</style></link> me with an equipment that costs 2 or less from hand.
descriptionRaw: Play: Equip me with an equipment that costs 2 or less from hand.
flavorText: "Though the woman seems a competent enough fighter, her grief is fresh and threatens to overwhelm her. Despair is indeed a compelling motivator--I should know--but unbridled so? Mayhap she is looking to die..." - From the personal journal of Sirius Rowill, Zealous Ranger-Knight
name: Widowed Huntress

flavorText: The standard sword and shield of choice for Demacia's helmeted brothers-in-arms.
name: Demacian Steel

description: The first time I see an ally <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link>, grant me <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: The first time I see an ally Equipped, grant me Tough.
flavorText: "Back, foul creature! Rend even a single hair from Purity's immaculate coat and I will see that you suffer AN ETERNITY OF AGONY!" - Sirius Rowill, Zealous Ranger-Knight
name: Steadfast Elkin

description: Once you've <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> an ally this game, grant me <link=keyword.Scout><sprite name=Scout><style=Keyword>Scout</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Once you've Equipped an ally this game, grant me Scout.
flavorText: Years of suppressing her magical abilities bred within her a fathomless self-hatred she maliciously unleashed on her victims. Once she had defected from the ranger-knights, her anger was aimless until a voice called in the darkness. It spoke of a new order, one where she could practice her cruelty unfettered.
name: Ranger-Knight Defector

description: When I'm summoned, I <link=vocab.Improvise><style=Vocab>Improvise</style></link> and <link=vocab.Forge><style=Vocab>Forge</style></link> me.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, I Improvise and Forge me.
flavorText: After his time in the Demacian military, Breshi thought he’d retire and cook at a quiet hamlet tavern. Jax ruined this retirement with a tavern brawl and a particularly bad opinion on hardboiled eggs. Since then, Breshi’s embraced a new lot in life: teaching Jax some taste.
name: Combat Cook

description:
If an ally died this round, I cost 2 less.
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equip</style></link> me with an equipment that costs 2 or less from hand.
descriptionRaw:
If an ally died this round, I cost 2 less.
Play: Equip me with an equipment that costs 2 or less from hand.
flavorText: "I've had Maggie since she was a pup. She may be long in the tooth, but she's still sharp as a fresh-whetted blade. I'd give my life for hers--and I know she'd give hers for mine." - Janan, Widowed Huntress
name: Faithful Wolfdog

description: <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equip</style></link> an ally with an equipment that costs 2 or less.
descriptionRaw: Equip an ally with an equipment that costs 2 or less.
flavorText: This move is more painful if the party hasn't eaten yet.
name: Catch!

description: Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
flavorText: This move is more painful if the party hasn't eaten yet.
name: Catch!

description:
To play me, kill an ally.
You may spend 10 mana to play me as <link=card.unit><style=AssociatedCard>Taarosh</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
To play me, kill an ally.
You may spend 10 mana to play me as Taarosh.
flavorText: Straining against the confines of his cell, Taarosh heard his general's call. He would answer it, one way or another.
name: The Darkin Halberd

description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: For each ally that died this round, grant all allied copies of it <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Round End: For each ally that died this round, grant all allied copies of it everywhere +1|+1.
flavorText: "I don't know what wicked magic they work, and I don't WANNA know. All's I need to know is that if they rise up, they're gettin' killed. Again." - Watcher on the Isles
name: Wraith of Echoes

description: If an ally died this round, I cost 2 less.
descriptionRaw: If an ally died this round, I cost 2 less.
flavorText: "There can be no justice... only revenge." - Kalista
name: Malefic Spear

description: Kill a unit with 2 or less power or destroy a unit's equipment.
descriptionRaw: Kill a unit with 2 or less power or destroy a unit's equipment.
flavorText: However death manifests on the Shadow Isles, may it be blessedly swift.
name: Quietus

description: To play me, kill an ally.
descriptionRaw: To play me, kill an ally.
name: The Darkin Halberd

description: Each round, the first time I attack, fill your attackers with revived <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copies of the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> followers you've <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slain</style></link> this game.
descriptionRaw: Each round, the first time I attack, fill your attackers with revived Ephemeral copies of the strongest followers you've slain this game.
flavorText: Legend says Taarosh was mere moments from destroying Xolaani when the Darkin were set upon by the Targonians. As centuries passed, he sensed the land around him become corrupted, tainted with rot and perpetual stench of death. How he dreamt of steeping Xolaani in this same suffering once he'd claimed his freedom.
name: Taarosh

description: Give an ally "<link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Icathian Mirage</style></link> with my equipment" this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally "Last Breath: Summon a Icathian Mirage with my equipment" this round.
flavorText: Sometimes, the best you can do for a fallen ally is to take up their weapon and continue the fight.
name: Blades of the Fallen

description: When I am summoned, or when you gain the attack token, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Ghastly Band</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I am summoned, or when you gain the attack token, summon a Ghastly Band.
flavorText: "The players are ready, the stage is set, our audience is waiting--Maestro, if you please!" - Boisterous Host
name: Opulent Foyer

description: When I would gain <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>, grant me +1|+1 instead.
descriptionRaw: When I would gain Ephemeral, grant me +1|+1 instead.
flavorText: Soldiers that had been trained to withstand punishment in life were only more diligent and able in death--undeterred by cold, pain, or fear.
name: Deathless Knight

description: When I'm summoned, I <link=vocab.Improvise><style=Vocab>Improvise</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, I Improvise.
flavorText: Jax asked for Fireth’s name two dozen times in their first weeks of travel together, but she would only ever growl, “I am the Reaper!”. Breshi found a novel solution—he’d just baked a cake, you see, and needed the name of the group’s strongest member to properly celebrate.
name: Fireth, Reaper of the Sands

description: Once you've <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> an ally this game, grant me <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Once you've Equipped an ally this game, grant me Lifesteal.
flavorText: "The Box does not give its secrets freely, Shieda Kayn. They come at a grim price. But if you have the courage to gaze into the shadow of shadows, you will find that wonderful, terrible things lay within." - Ysdra, Keeper of the Box
name: Keeper of the Box

flavorText: Perhaps they are a mirage. Perhaps she and hers hail from a remote, hidden village. She says nothing of her origin, and Jax does not ask. But when she rises from the sands and stands beside him, they fight in perfect, soundless, impossible harmony.
name: Icathian Mirage

description: Kill an ally to summon an <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Encroaching Mist</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Kill an ally to summon an Encroaching Mist.
flavorText: Only a fool would stare into the Black Mist in hopes of deciphering a familiar shape.
name: Shape of Fear

description: Kill all units except allied Darkin and allied <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> units.
descriptionRaw: Kill all units except allied Darkin and allied Equipped units.
flavorText: As she took hold of the weapons, her humanity fled, and in its place a hateful essence filled the emptying vessel that was once the student Jun. It washed through her, over her, around her, and out into the world, stirring the slumbering Darkin.
name: Utter Devastation

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Ghastly Band</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Summon an attacking Ghastly Band.
flavorText: Striving for perfection was limiting, rigid. Perfection had no life; could not breathe. However, perfect imperfection--now, that was something to strive for.
name: Redeemed Prodigy

description: Destroy a unit's equipment.
descriptionRaw: Destroy a unit's equipment.
flavorText: However death manifests on the Shadow Isles, may it be blessedly swift.
name: Quietus

description: Kill a unit with 2 or less power.
descriptionRaw: Kill a unit with 2 or less power.
flavorText: However death manifests on the Shadow Isles, may it be blessedly swift.
name: Quietus

description:
When you summon an <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> ally, grant it +1|+0.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sapling</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
When you summon an Ephemeral ally, grant it +1|+0.
Nightfall: Summon a Sapling.
flavorText: Far from the Shadow Isles' shores are copses of trees thought long-dead, crooked and unmoving to all but the most keen observer--who will note that in that moon-drenched soil, new life stirs.
name: Moonlit Glenkeeper
